itunes:title: The Ghost at the Mānoa Tennis Courts (with Lopaka Kapanui)
title: The Ghost at the Mānoa Tennis Courts (with Lopaka Kapanui)
description:
Could there be a link between ghost sightings near the Mānoa Tennis Courts and a horrible crime committed on the grounds in 1911?
